name: Tastee Jerk
address: 200-03 Hollis Ave, St. Albans, NY 11412, USA

reviews.text: the escovitch fish is definitely a must have . I made an order through doordash and i was contacted to confirm my order and I told them to make it extra spicy and that‚Äôs how I got it.
I had there Ackee and Saltfish the other morning and I'm not an Ackee and Saltfish person but there's was pretty good and the Cornmeal porridge was good.

I dont normally leave reviews but I felt like I needed to leave one. I purchased an oxtail meal with rice and peas and a side of steam veg here and I can confidently say that it was good, wasnt disappointed at all.  the service I received was good  as well.

They literally served me OLD STALE MEAT that had a rotten stench like it was there for days, and an expired juice that I didn‚Äôt realize until I tasted it and it burned my throat. My stomach has been hurting me all day ever since and I‚Äôm on my way to the emergency room now for what I‚Äôm sure is food poisoning. The department of health will be contacted about this place.
